name: Korecki Real Estate Services Inc.
tag_list: property-management, vancouver-property-management, richmond-property-management, property-management-vancouver, property-management-richmond, richmond-strata-management, vancouver-strata-management
overview:
Welcome to Korecki Real Estate Services. We provide professional, experienced Strata Management and Property Management services to clients throughout the Lower Mainland, including Greater Vancouver, Richmond and Burnaby.

Thanks to our years of experience, we are proud to offer a full range of Strata Management services, including meeting attendance, arranging building inspections and maintenance, owner and tenant registry, accounting services and much more. We also offer a wide range of Residential Property Management services, including furnished and unfurnished property management and lease-up, as well as rental building leasing, maintenance and accounting.

As part of our first-class service commitment, we do not charge any management fees until your property starts generating revenue. Our competitive rates, multi-unit discounts and no hidden fees promise give you access to affordable property management without compromising on quality.

Korecki Real Estate Services is committed to meeting all of your Vancouver Property Management and Strata Management needs. Our dedication to unparalleled, no-hassle customer service and smooth, efficient building operations will help you to generate maximum profit from your valuable real estate investment.
